thread.title: Militants strike Afghan ministry in deadly attack

title: Militants strike Afghan ministry in deadly attack
text:
Militants strike Afghan ministry in deadly attack 2:57pm BST - 01:03
Gunmen armed with assault rifles and grenade launchers stormed the heavily fortified headquarters of the Afghan interior ministry on Wednesday, battling security forces for more than two hours in the latest attack on the capital Kabul.
Gunmen armed with assault rifles and grenade launchers stormed the heavily fortified headquarters of the Afghan interior ministry on Wednesday, battling security forces for more than two hours in the latest attack on the capital Kabul. //reut.rs/2H3onXd
